pullrequest.title: Addition of ERP and CFM keys on urdf parser

content.raw:
this functionality exists and was well documented in pull request #225, though in trying to create an example and add an integration test, I've discovered some issues

this PR would enable the following:

~~~
<gazebo reference="joint_name">
  <cfm>0.0</cfm>
  <erp>0.9</erp>
</gazebo>
~~~

With existing code using the pattern described in pr #225, the following should be equivalent:

~~~
<gazebo reference="joint_name">
  <physics>
    <ode>
      <cfm>0.0</cfm>
      <erp>0.9</erp>
    </ode>
  </physics>
</gazebo>
~~~

I'll write up an issue describing the bugs that I've noticed while trying to add a test for this functionality.
